attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: This app took hours to load, and once I opened the app it shut down my entire phone. For days I was phone-less until I finally took it to the shop to get it fixed. The guy who fixed my phone told me that this app has been causing the same problems that I had my phone fixed for. In the end  do not download this or you will end up having to pay $100 to fix your phone.
